code: import axios from'../config/axios';export var setBorrows=function setBorrows(borrows){return{type:'SET_BORROWS',payload:borrows};};export var startSetBorrows=function startSetBorrows(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/borrows').then(function(response){var borrows=response.data;if(Array.isArray(borrows)){dispatch(setBorrows(borrows));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var addBorrow=function addBorrow(borrow){return{type:'ADD_BORROW',payload:borrow};};export var startAddBorrow=function startAddBorrow(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/borrows',formData).then(function(response){if(typeof response.data==='object'){dispatch(addBorrow(response.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};var editBorrow=function editBorrow(borrow){return{type:'EDIT_BORROW',payload:borrow};};export var startEditBorrow=function startEditBorrow(id,formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put("/borrows/".concat(id),formData).then(function(response){if(typeof response.data==='object'){dispatch(editBorrow(response.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var startTrashAndStarBorrows=function startTrashAndStarBorrows(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put('/borrows',formData).then(function(response){var borrows=response.data;if(Array.isArray(borrows)){dispatch(setBorrows(borrows));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var startDeleteTrashBorrows=function startDeleteTrashBorrows(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put('/borrows_delete',formData).then(function(response){var borrows=response.data;if(Array.isArray(borrows)){dispatch(setBorrows(borrows));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
